title: Fork, ca. 1720–50
markings: On back of neck: ..Z II ; Dutch import mark, 1953; Tardy, SILVER , 1981, p. 327
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork has three short tines, curved shoulders, long baluster shaped neck. Silver ferrule with horizontal bands, plain silver band on the handle. Agate handle oval in section with rounded top, small metal mount on top.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1720–50.
ca. 1720–50. Agate, silver, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-117.
